1. Download jOOQ from https://www.jooq.org/download/
2. Copy:
    -) jaxb-api-*.jar
    -) jooq-*.jar
    -) jooq-checker-*.jar
    -) jooq-codegen-*.jar
    -) jooq-meta-*.jar
    -) jooq-meta-extensions-*.jar
    -) jooq-meta-extensions-hibernate-*.jar
    -) jooq-meta-extensions-liquibase-*.jar
    -) r2dbc-spi-*.jar
    -) reactive-streams-*.jar
    from jOOQ-src folder to this folder. (Currently using jOOQ version 3.15.4)
